channel.title: Oiram (My new puzzle platformer!)
channel.description:
Hey guys! Just wanted to show you all some screenshots of my new platformer game I'm working on. It make look similar to another game you might have played or heard of, but it's not going to end up like that at all. I am going to completely change it. Please don't judge the game at all based on what you see here!
[img]http://puu.sh/kmBrK/80e323c5c6.png[/img]

… isnt this just a mario clone?
[/quote]no… i said dont judge the game based on what you see here. its going to be completely different.
[/quote]then what is the purpose of this thread?
[/quote]so you can look ahead at what it might be like.
[/quote]ok, what are you changing? is it still going to be a puzzle platformer?
[/quote]look ahead!
[/quote]at what?[/quote]LOOK AHEAD!
